name: BankLoanDelayedDrawFunding
definition:
Delayed draw funding. Certain issuers may utilize delayed draw loans whereby the lender is committed to fund cash
within a specified period once a call is made by the issuer. The lender receives a fee for entering into such a
commitment

name: BankLoanFees
definition:
Bank loan fees. Cash activity related to specific bank loan fees, including (a) agent / assignment fees; (b) amendment fees; (c) commitment fees; (d) consent fees; (e) cost of carry fees; (f) delayed compensation fees; (g)
facility fees; (h) fronting fees; (i) funding fees; (j) letter of credit assignment fees

name: BankLoanFundingMemo
definition:
Bank loan funding memo. Net cash movement for the loan contract final notification when sent separately from the
loan contract final notification instruction.

name: BankLoanAccruedInterestPayment
definition: Accrued interest payments. Specific to bank loans.

name: BankLoanPrincipalPaydown
definition: Principal paydowns. Specific to bank loans

name: CardBulkClearing
definition: A Service that is settling money for a bulk of card transactions, while referring to a specific transaction file or other information like terminal ID, card acceptor ID or other transaction details.

name: CardPaymentWithCashBack
definition: Purchase of Goods and Services with additional Cash disbursement at the POI (Cashback)

name: CashDisbursementCashSettlement
definition: ATM Cash Withdrawal in an unattended or Cash Advance in an attended environment (POI or bank counter)

name: CashDisbursementWithSurcharging
definition: ATM Cash Withdrawal in an unattended or Cash Advance in an attended environment (POI or bank counter) with surcharging.

name: CardDeferredPayment
definition:
A combined service which enables the card acceptor to perform an authorisation for a temporary amount and a completion for the final amount within a limited time frame. Deferred Payment is only available in the unattended environment.
Examples where this service is widely used are unattended petrol pumps and phone booths

name: OriginalCredit
definition: A service which allows the card acceptor to effect a credit to a cardholder' account. Unlike a Merchant Refund, an Original Credit is not preceded by a card payment. This service is used for example for crediting winnings from gaming.

name: QuasiCash
definition: Purchase of Goods which are equivalent to cash like coupons in casinos.

name: EPurseTopUp
definition: Transaction is related to a Service that is first reserving money from a card account and then is loading an e-purse application by this amount.

name: FeeCollection
definition: A Service that is settling card transaction related fees between two parties.

name: MobileTopUp
definition: A Service that is first reserving money from a card account and then is loading a prepaid mobile phone amount by this amount.

name: AccountManagement
definition: Transaction moves funds between 2 accounts of same account holder at the same bank.

name: CashManagementTransfer
definition: Transaction is a general cash management instruction.

name: CollectionPayment
definition: Transaction is a collection of funds initiated via a credit transfer or direct debit.

name: CashDisbursementCashManagement
definition: Transaction is related to cash disbursement.

name: Deposit
definition: Transaction is releted to a payment of deposit.

name: IntraCompanyPayment
definition: Transaction is an intra-company payment, ie, a payment between two companies belonging to the same group.

name: IntraPartyPayment
definition: Transaction is a payment between two accounts belonging to the same party (intra-party payment), where party is a natural person (identified by a private ID, not organisation ID).

name: LiquidityManagement
definition: Bank initiated account transfer to support zero target balance management, pooling or sweeping.

name: Netting
definition: Transaction is related to a netting operation.

name: BondForward
definition: Cash collateral related to any securities traded out beyond 3 days which include treasury notes, JGBs and Gilts.

name: CrossCurrencyIRS
definition: Cash Collateral related to a Cross Currency Interest Rate Swap, indicating the exchange of fixed interest payments in one currency for those in another.

name: CCPClearedInitialMargin
definition: Cash Collateral associated with an ISDA or Central Clearing Agreement that is covering the initial margin requirements for OTC trades clearing through a CCP.

name: CCPClearedVariationMargin
definition: Cash Collateral associated with an ISDA or Central Clearing Agreement that is covering the variation margin requirements for OTC trades clearing through a CCP.

name: CCPClearedInitialMarginSegregatedCash
definition: CCP Segregated initial margin: Initial margin on OTC Derivatives cleared through a CCP that requires segregation

name: CreditDefaultSwap
definition: Cash collateral related to trading of credit default swap.

name: CrossProduct
definition: Cash collateral related to a combination of various types of trades.

name: CreditSupport
definition: Cash collateral related to cash lending/borrowing; letter of Credit; signing of master agreement.

name: CreditLine
definition: Cash collateral related to opening of a credit line before trading.

name: EquityOption
definition: Cash collateral related to trading of equity option (Also known as stock options).

name: EquitySwap
definition: Cash collateral related to equity swap trades where the return of an equity is exchanged for either a fixed or a floating rate of interest.

name: ExoticOption
definition: Cash collateral related to trading of an exotic option for example a non-standard option.

name: ExchangeTradedDerivatives
definition: Cash collateral related to trading of exchanged traded derivatives in general (Opposite to Over the Counter (OTC)).

name: FixedIncome
definition: Cash collateral related to a fixed income instrument

name: ForwardBrokerOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment against a Master Forward Agreement (MFA) where the cash is held in a segregated account and is not available for use by the client. Includes any instruments with a forward settling date such TBAs, repurchase agreements and bond forwards

name: ForwardClientOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment against a Master Forward Agreement (MFA) where the cash is owned and may be used by the client when returned. Includes any instruments with a forward settling date such TBAs, repurchase agreements and bond forwards

name: ForwardBrokerOwnedCashCollateralSegregated
definition: Any cash payment related to the collateral for a Master Agreement forward, which is segregated, and not available for use by the client. Example master agreement forwards include TBA, repo and Bond Forwards.

name: ForwardClientOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Any cash payment related to the collateral for a Master agreement forward, which is owned by the client and is available for use by the client when it is returned to them from the segregated account. Example master agreement forwards include TBA, repo and Bond Forwards.

name: DailyMarginOnListedDerivatives
definition:
Daily margin on listed derivatives – not segregated as collateral associated with an FCM agreement. Examples
include listed futures and options margin payments; premiums for listed options not covered in the MT54X message

name: MBSBrokerOwnedCashCollateral
definition: MBS Broker Owned Segregated (40Act/Dodd Frank) Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for a Mortgage Back Security, which is segregated, and not available for use by the client.

name: MBSClientOwnedCashCollateral
definition: MBS Client Owned Cash Segregated (40Act/Dodd Frank) Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for a Mortgage Back Security, which is owned by the client and is available for use by the client when it is returned to them from the segregated account

name: FuturesInitialMargin
definition: Initial futures margin. Where such payment is owned by the client and is available for use by them on return

name: FuturesInitialMarginClientOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Margin Client Owned Segregated Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for initial futures margin, which is owned by the client and is available for use by the client when it is returned to them from the segregated account.

name: ClientOwnedOCCPledgedCollateral
definition: Client owned collateral identified as eligible for OCC pledging

name: OTCOptionBrokerOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment for OTC options associated with an FCM agreement. Where such payment is segregated and not available for use by the client

name: OTCOptionClientOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment for OTC options associated with an FCM agreement. Where such payment is not segregated and is available for use by the client upon return

name: OTCOptionBrokerOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Option Broker Owned Segregated Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for an OTC option, which is segregated, and not available for use by the client.

name: OTCOptionClientOwnedCashSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Option Client Owned Cash Segregated Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for an OTC option, which is owned by the client and is available for use by the client when it is returned to them from the segregated account

name: FXOption
definition: Cash collateral related to trading of option on Foreign Exchange.

name: OTCDerivatives
definition: Cash collateral related to Over-the-counter (OTC) Derivatives in general for example contracts which are traded and privately negotiated.

name: RepurchaseAgreement
definition: Cash collateral related to a repurchase agreement transaction.

name: BilateralRepoBrokerOwnedCollateral
definition:
Bi-lateral repo broker owned collateral associated with a repo master agreement – GMRA or MRA Master Repo
Agreements

name: RepoClientOwnedCollateral
definition: Repo client owned collateral associated with a repo master agreement – GMRA or MRA Master Repo Agreements

name: BilateralRepoBrokerOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Bi-lateral repo broker owned segregated cash collateral associated with a repo master agreement

name: BilateralRepoClientOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition: Repo client owned segregated collateral associated with a repo master agreement

name: ReverseRepurchaseAgreement
definition: Cash collateral related to a reverse repurchase agreement transaction.

name: SecuritiesBuySellSellBuyBack
definition: Cash collateral related to a Securities Buy Sell Sell Buy Back

name: SingleCurrencyIRSExotic
definition: Cash collateral related to Exotic single currency interest rate swap.

name: SingleCurrencyIRS
definition: Cash collateral related to Single Currency Interest Rate Swap.

name: SecuritiesCrossProducts
definition: Cash collateral related to Combination of securities-related exposure types.

name: BrokerOwnedCollateralShortSale
definition: Short Sale broker owned collateral associated with a prime broker agreement

name: ClientOwnedCollateralShortSale
definition: Short Sale client owned collateral associated with a prime brokerage agreement

name: ShortSell
definition: Cash Collateral related to a Short Sell

name: SecuritiesLendingAndBorrowing
definition: Cash collateral related to Securities lending and borrowing.

name: SecuredLoan
definition: Cash collateral related to a Secured loan.

name: SwapBrokerOwnedCashCollateral
definition:
Cash collateral payment for swaps associated with an ISDA agreement. . Where such payment is segregated and
not available for use by the client. Includes any cash collateral payments made under the terms of a CSA agreement
for instruments such as swaps and FX forwards.

name: SwapClientOwnedCashCollateral
definition:
Cash collateral payment for swaps associated with an ISDA agreement. Where such payment is not segregated and
is available for use by the client upon return. Includes any cash collateral payments made under the terms of a CSA
agreement for instruments such as swaps and FX forwards.

name: Swaption
definition: Cash collateral related to an option on interest rate swap.

name: SwapsBrokerOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition:
Swaps Broker Owned Segregated Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for Swap margin ,
which is segregated, and not available for use by the client. This includes any collateral identified in a CSA
agreement such as Swap or FX Forward collateral.

name: SwapsClientOwnedSegregatedCashCollateral
definition:
Swaps Client Owned Segregated Cash Collateral - Any cash payment related to the collateral for Swap margin,
which is owned by the client and is available for use by the client when returned from the segregated account. This
includes any collateral identified in a CSA agreement such as Swap or FX Forward collateral.

name: ToBeAnnounced
definition: Cash collateral related to a To Be Announced (TBA)

name: TBABrokerOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment (segregated) for TBA securities associated with a TBA Master Agreement. Where such payment is segregated and not available for use by the client.

name: TBAClientOwnedCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payment (for use by client)for TBA securities associated with a TBA Master Agreement. Where such payment is not segregated and is available for use by the client upon return.

name: TreasuryCrossProduct
definition: Cash collateral related to a combination of treasury-related exposure types.

name: AgriculturalTransfer
definition: Transaction is related to the agricultural domain.

name: AccountsReceivablesEntry
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with an Account Receivable Entry

name: BusinessExpenses
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of business expenses.

name: BackOfficeConversionEntry
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with a Back Office Conversion Entry

name: CommercialPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of commercial credit or debit. (formerly CommercialCredit)

name: Copyright
definition: Transaction is payment of copyright.

name: PurchaseSaleOfGoods
definition: Transaction is related to purchase and sale of goods.

name: PurchaseSaleOfGoodsAndServices
definition: Transaction is related to purchase and sale of goods and services.

name: PurchaseSaleOfGoodsAndServicesWithCashBack
definition: Transaction is related to purchase and sale of goods and services with cash back.

name: LicenseFee
definition: Transaction is payment of a license fee.

name: MobileP2BPayment
definition: A service which enables a user to use an app on its mobile to pay a merchant or other business payees by initiating a payment message. Within this context, the account information or an alias of the payee might be transported through different channels to the app, for example QR Code, NFC, Bluetooth, other Networks.

name: PointOfPurchaseEntry
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with a Point of Purchase Entry.

name: Royalties
definition: Transaction is the payment of royalties.

name: PurchaseSaleOfServices
definition: Transaction is related to purchase and sale of services.

name: ServiceCharges
definition: Transaction is related to service charges charged by a service provider.

name: Subscription
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of information or entertainment services either in printed or electronic form.

name: SupplierPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment to a supplier.

name: Commercial
definition: Transaction is related to a trade services operation.

name: CharityPayment
definition: Transaction is a payment for charity reasons.

name: ConsumerThirdPartyConsolidatedPayment
definition: Transaction is a payment used by a third party who can collect funds to pay on behalf of consumers, ie credit counseling or bill payment companies.

name: MobileP2PPayment
definition: A service which enables a user to use an app on its mobile to initiate moving funds from his/her bank account to another person’s bank account while not using the account number  but an alias information like an MSISDN as account addressing information in his/her app.

name: GuaranteedEPayment
definition: E-Commerce payment with payment guarantee of the issuing bank.

name: EPaymentReturn
definition: E-Commerce payment return.

name: NonGuaranteedEPayment
definition: E-Commerce payment without payment guarantee of the issuing bank.

name: Epayment
definition: Transaction is related to ePayment.

name: CarLoanPrincipalRepayment
definition: Transaction is a payment of car loan principal payment.

name: CompensationPayment
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of a compensation relating to interest loss/value date adjustment and can include fees.

name: DebitCollectionPayment
definition: Collection of funds initiated via a debit transfer.

name: GovernmentInsurance
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of government insurance.

name: PropertyLoanRepayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of property loan.

name: PropertyLoanSettlement
definition: Transaction is related to the settlement of a property loan.

name: InsurancePremiumCar
definition: Transaction is a payment of car insurance premium.

name: InsurancePremiumRefund
definition: Transaction is related to an insurance premium refund.

name: PaymentOfInsuranceClaim
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of an insurance claim.

name: InsurancePremium
definition: Transaction is payment of an insurance premium.

name: Interest
definition: Transaction is payment of interest.

name: LaborInsurance
definition: Transaction is a payment of labor insurance.

name: LifeInsurance
definition: Transaction is a payment of life insurance.

name: Loan
definition: Transaction is related to transfer of loan to borrower.

name: LoanRepayment
definition: Transaction is related to repayment of loan to lender.

name: PaymentBasedOnEnforcementOrder
definition: Payment based on enforcement orders except those arising from judicial alimony decrees.

name: PropertyInsurance
definition: Transaction is a payment of property insurance.

name: RentalLeaseGeneral
definition: Transaction is for general rental/lease.

name: RecurringInstallmentPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of a recurring installment made at regular intervals.

name: TrustFund
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of a trust fund.

name: ForwardForeignExchange
definition: FX trades with a value date in the future.

name: ForeignExchangeRelatedNetting
definition: FX netting if cash is moved by separate wire instead of within the closing FX instruction

name: AdministrativeManagement
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with administrative management.

name: AdvancePayment
definition: Transaction is an advance payment.

name: BearerChequeDomestic
definition: Transaction is the payment of a domestic bearer cheque.

name: BearerChequeForeign
definition: Transaction is the payment of a foreign bearer cheque.

name: BuildingMaintenance
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with building maintenance.

name: BondForwardNetting
definition: Bond Forward pair-off cash net movement

name: CapitalBuilding
definition: Transaction is related to capital building fringe fortune, ie capital building in general

name: CapitalBuildingRetirement
definition: Transaction is related to capital building fringe fortune for retirement

name: CreditCardPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of credit card account.

name: CreditCardBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of credit card bill.

name: CancellationFee
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of cancellation fee.

name: CardGeneratedDirectDebit
definition: Transaction is related to a direct debit where the mandate was generated by using data from a payment card at the point of sale.

name: TradeSettlementPayment
definition: Transaction is related to settlement of a trade, e.g. a foreign exchange deal or a securities transaction.

name: Costs
definition: Transaction is related to payment of costs.

name: CarparkCharges
definition: Transaction is related to carpark charges.

name: DebitCardPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a debit card payment.

name: PrintedOrderDisbursement
definition: Transaction is the payment of a disbursement due to a specific type of printed order for a payment of a  specified sum, issued by a bank or a post office (Zahlungsanweisung zur Verrechnung)

name: DeliverAgainstPayment
definition: Code used to pre-advise the account servicer of a forthcoming deliver against payment instruction.

name: Education
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of study/tuition fees.

name: FactorUpdateRelatedPayment
definition: Payment related to a factor update

name: FinancialAidInCaseOfNaturalDisaster
definition: Financial aid by State authorities for abolition of consequences of natural disasters.

name: LatePaymentOfFeesAndCharges
definition: Transaction is the payment for late fees & charges. E.g Credit card charges

name: PaymentOfFees
definition: Payment of fees/charges.

name: Gift
definition: Payment with no commercial or statutory purpose.

name: GovernmentPayment
definition: Transaction is a payment to or from a government department.

name: IrrevocableCreditCardPayment
definition: Transaction is reimbursement of credit card payment.

name: IrrevocableDebitCardPayment
definition: Transaction is reimbursement of debit card payment.

name: InstalmentHirePurchaseAgreement
definition: Transaction is payment for an installment/hire-purchase agreement.

name: Installment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of an installment.

name: InvoicePayment
definition: Transaction is the payment for invoices.

name: MultiCurrenyChequeDomestic
definition: Transaction is the payment of a domestic multi-currency cheque

name: MultiCurrenyChequeForeign
definition: Transaction is the payment of a foreign multi-currency cheque

name: MultipleServiceTypes
definition: Transaction is related to a payment for multiple service types.

name: NotOtherwiseSpecified
definition: Transaction is related to a payment for type of services not specified elsewhere.

name: OrderChequeDomestic
definition: Transaction is the payment of a domestic order cheque

name: OrderChequeForeign
definition: Transaction is the payment of a foreign order cheque

name: OpeningFee
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of opening fee.

name: Other
definition: Other payment purpose.

name: PreauthorizedDebit
definition: Transaction is related to a pre-authorized debit origination

name: PaymentTerms
definition: Transaction is related to payment terms specifications

name: RepresentedCheckEntry
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with a re-presented check entry

name: ReceiptPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of receipt.

name: Rebate
definition: Transaction is the payment of a rebate.

name: Refund
definition: Transaction is the payment of a refund.

name: Rent
definition: Transaction is the payment of rent.

name: AccountOverdraftRepayment
definition: Transaction is for account overdraft repayment

name: ReimbursementOfAPreviousErroneousTransaction
definition: Transaction is related to a reimbursement of a previous erroneous transaction.

name: BilateralRepoInternetNetting
definition: Bi-lateral repo interest net/bulk payment at rollover/pair-off or other closing scenarios where applicable

name: RoundRobin
definition: Cash payment resulting from a Round Robin

name: ReimbursementReceivedCreditTransfer
definition: Transaction is related to a reimbursement for commercial reasons of a correctly received credit transfer.

name: RelatedRequestToPay
definition: Transaction is related to a Request to Pay.

name: ReceiveAgainstPayment
definition: Code used to pre-advise the account servicer of a forthcoming receive against payment instruction.

name: PaymentSlipInstruction
definition: Transaction is payment of a well formatted payment slip.

name: SplitPayments
definition:
Split payments. To be used when cash and security movements for a security trade settlement are instructed
separately.

name: Study
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of study/tuition costs.

name: TBAPairOffNetting
definition: TBA pair-off cash wire net movement

name: TelecommunicationsBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of telecommunications related bill.

name: TownCouncilServiceCharges
definition: Transaction is related to a payment associated with charges levied by a town council.

name: TelephoneInitiatedTransaction
definition: Transaction is related to a payment initiated via telephone.

name: TMPGClaimPayment
definition: Cash payment resulting from a TMPG Claim

name: TriPartyRepoInterest
definition: Tri-Party Repo related interest

name: TriPartyRepoNetting
definition: Tri-party Repo related net gain/loss cash movement

name: TruncatedPaymentSlip
definition: Transaction is payment of a beneficiary prefilled payment slip where beneficiary to payer information is truncated.

name: TravellerCheque
definition: Transaction is the payment of a travellers cheque

name: InternetInitiatedTransaction
definition: Transaction is related to a payment initiated via internet.

name: InstantPayments
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately.

name: InstantPaymentsCancellation
definition: Transaction in which the Return of the amount is fully returned.

name: InstantPaymentsForDonations
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately, done for donations, with sending the address data of the payer.

name: InstantPaymentsInECommerceWithoutAddressData
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately, done in E-commerce, without sending the address data of the payer.

name: InstantPaymentsInECommerceWithAddressData
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately, done in E-commerce, with sending the address data of the payer.

name: InstantPaymentsInECommerce
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately, done in E-commerce.

name: InstantPaymentsAtPOS
definition: Transaction in which the amount is available to the payee immediately, done at POS.

name: InstantPaymentsReturn
definition: Transaction in which the Return of the amount is fully or partial returned.

name: InstantPaymentsUnattendedVendingMachineWith2FA
definition: Transaction is made via an unattending vending machine by using 2-factor-authentification.

name: InstantPaymentsUnattendedVendingMachineWithout2FA
definition: Transaction is made via an unattending vending machine by without using 2-factor-authentification.

name: Annuity
definition: Transaction settles annuity related to credit, insurance, investments, other.n

name: CustodianManagementFeeInhouse
definition: Transaction is the payment of custodian account management fee where custodian bank and current account servicing bank coincide

name: CapitalFallingDueInhouse
definition: Transaction is the payment of capital falling due where custodian bank and current account servicing bank coincide

name: CommodityTransfer
definition: Transaction is payment of commodities.

name: Derivatives
definition: Transaction is related to a derivatives transaction

name: Dividend
definition: Transaction is payment of dividends.

name: ForeignExchange
definition: Transaction is related to a foreign exchange operation.

name: Hedging
definition: Transaction is related to a hedging operation.

name: InvestmentAndSecurities
definition: Transaction is for the payment of mutual funds, investment products and shares

name: PreciousMetal
definition: Transaction is related to a precious metal operation.

name: Savings
definition: Transfer to / from savings or to retirement account.

name: Securities
definition: Transaction is the payment of securities.

name: SecuritiesPurchaseInhouse
definition: Transaction is the payment of a purchase of securities where custodian bank and current account servicing bank coincide

name: TreasuryPayment
definition: Transaction is related to treasury operations.

name: UnitTrustPurchase
definition: Transaction is purchase of Unit Trust

name: FuturesNettingPayment
definition: Cash associated with a netting of futures payments. Refer to CCPM codeword for netting of initial and variation margin through a CCP

name: Futures
definition: Cash related to futures trading activity.

name: AnesthesiaServices
definition: Transaction is a payment for anesthesia services.

name: ConvalescentCareFacility
definition: Transaction is a payment for convalescence care facility services.

name: DurableMedicaleEquipment
definition: Transaction is a payment is for use of durable medical equipment.

name: DentalServices
definition: Transaction is a payment for dental services.

name: HomeHealthCare
definition: Transaction is a payment for home health care services.

name: HealthInsurance
definition: Transaction is a payment of health insurance.

name: HospitalCare
definition: Transaction is a payment for hospital care services.

name: IntermediateCareFacility
definition: Transaction is a payment for intermediate care facility services.

name: LongTermCareFacility
definition: Transaction is a payment for long-term care facility services.

name: MedicalAidFundContribution
definition: Transaction is contribution to medical aid fund.

name: MedicalAidRefund
definition: Transaction is related to a medical aid refund.

name: MedicalServices
definition: Transaction is a payment for medical care services.

name: VisionCare
definition: Transaction is a payment for vision care services.

name: CreditDefaultEventPayment
definition: Payment related to a credit default event

name: SwapContractFinalPayment
definition: Final payments for a swap contract

name: SwapContractPartialPayment
definition: Partial payment for a swap contract

name: SwapContractResetPayment
definition: Reset payment for a swap contract

name: SwapContractUpfrontPayment
definition: Upfront payment for a swap contract

name: AdvisoryDonationCopyrightServices
definition: Payments for donation, sponsorship, advisory, intellectual and other copyright services.

name: ActiveEmploymentPolicy
definition: Payment concerning active employment policy.

name: Allowance
definition: Transaction is the payment of allowances.

name: AlimonyPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of alimony.

name: BabyBonusScheme
definition: Transaction is related to a payment made as incentive to encourage parents to have more children

name: ChildBenefit
definition: Transaction is related to a payment made to assist parent/guardian to maintain child.

name: UnemploymentDisabilityBenefit
definition: Transaction is related to a payment to a person who is unemployed/disabled.

name: BonusPayment.
definition: Transaction is related to payment of a bonus.

name: CashCompensationHelplessnessDisability
definition: Payments made by Government institute related to cash compensation, helplessness, disability. These payments are made by the Government institution as a social benefit in addition to regularly paid salary or pension.

name: Commission
definition: Transaction is payment of commission.

name: CompanySocialLoanPaymentToBank
definition: Transaction is a payment by a company to a bank for financing social loans to employees.

name: GuaranteeFundRightsPayment
definition: Compensation to unemployed persons during insolvency procedures.

name: AustrianGovernmentEmployeesCategoryA
definition: Transaction is payment to category A Austrian government employees.

name: AustrianGovernmentEmployeesCategoryB
definition: Transaction is payment to category B Austrian government employees.

name: AustrianGovernmentEmployeesCategoryC
definition: Transaction is payment to category C Austrian government employees.

name: AustrianGovernmentEmployeesCategoryD
definition: Transaction is payment to category D Austrian government employees.

name: GovermentWarLegislationTransfer
definition: Payment to victims of war violence and to disabled soldiers.

name: HousingRelatedContribution
definition: Transaction is a contribution by an employer to the housing expenditures (purchase, construction, renovation) of the employees within a tax free fringe benefit system

name: Payroll
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of payroll.

name: PensionFundContribution
definition: Transaction is contribution to pension fund.

name: PensionPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of pension.

name: PricePayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of a price.

name: RehabilitationSupport
definition: Benefit for the duration of occupational rehabilitation.

name: SalaryPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of salaries.

name: SalaryPensionSumPayment
definition: Salary or pension payment for more months in one amount or a delayed payment of salaries or pensions.

name: SocialSecurityBenefit
definition: Transaction is a social security benefit, ie payment made by a government to support individuals.

name: LendingBuyInNetting
definition: Net payment related to a buy-in. When an investment manager is bought in on a sell trade that fails due to a failed securities lending recall, the IM may seize the underlying collateral to pay for the buy-in. Any difference between the value of the collateral and the sell proceeds would be paid or received under this code

name: LendingCashCollateralFreeMovement
definition: Free movement of cash collateral. Cash collateral paid by the borrower is done separately from the delivery of the shares at loan opening or return of collateral done separately from return of the loaned security. Note: common when the currency of the security is different the currency of the cash collateral.

name: LendingFees
definition:
Fee payments, other than rebates, for securities lending. Includes (a) exclusive fees; (b) transaction fees; (c)
custodian fees; (d) minimum balance fees

name: LendingEquityMarkedToMarketCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payments resulting from the marked-to-market of a portfolio of loaned equity securities

name: LendingFixedIncomeMarkedToMarketCashCollateral
definition: Cash collateral payments resulting from the marked-to-market of a portfolio of loaned fixed income securities

name: LendingUnspecifiedTypeOfMarkedToMarketCashCollateral
definition:
Cash collateral payments resulting from the marked-to-market of a portfolio of loaned securities where the instrument
types are not specified

name: LendingRebatePayments
definition: Securities lending rebate payments

name: LendingRevenuePayments
definition: Revenue payments made by the lending agent to the client

name: LendingClaimPayment
definition: Payments made by a borrower to a lending agent to satisfy claims made by the investment manager related to sell fails from late loan recall deliveries

name: EstateTax

name: ForeignWorkerLevy

name: GoodsServicesTax
definition: Transaction is the payment of Goods & Services Tax

definition: Transaction is related to a payment of housing tax.

definition: Transaction is the payment of value added tax.

name: WithHolding
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of withholding tax.

name: TaxRefund
definition: Transaction is the refund of a tax payment or obligation.

name: TrailerFeePayment
definition: US mutual fund trailer fee (12b-1) payment

name: TrailerFeeRebate
definition: US mutual fund trailer fee (12b-1) rebate payment

name: NonUSMutualFundTrailerFeePayment
definition: Any non-US mutual fund trailer fee (retrocession) payment (use ISIN to determine onshore versus offshore designation)

name: NonUSMutualFundTrailerFeeRebatePayment
definition: Any non-US mutual fund trailer fee (retrocession) rebate payment (use ISIN to determine onshore versus offshore designation)

name: Air
definition: Transaction is a payment for air transport related business.

name: Bus
definition: Transaction is a payment for bus transport related business.

name: Ferry
definition: Transaction is a payment for ferry related business.

name: Railway
definition: Transaction is a payment for railway transport related business.

name: RoadPricing
definition: Transaction is for the payment to top-up pre-paid card and electronic road pricing for the purpose of transportation

name: CableTVBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of cable TV bill.

name: ElectricityBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of electricity bill.

name: Energies
definition: Transaction is related to a utility operation.

name: GasBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of gas bill.

name: NetworkCharge
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of network charges.

name: NetworkCommunication
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of network communication.

name: OtherTelecomRelatedBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of other telecom related bill.

name: TelephoneBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of telephone bill.

name: Utilities
definition: Transaction is for the payment to common utility provider that provide gas, water and/or electricity.

name: WaterBill
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of water bill.

name: Bonds

name: CorporateActions-Bonds
definition: Securities Lending-Settlement of Corporate Actions: Bonds transactions.

name: CorporateActions-Equities
definition: Securities Lending-Settlement of Corporate Actions: Equities transactions.

name: CreditCard

definition: Card Settlement-Settlement of Diners transactions.

name: Equities
definition: Securities Lending-Settlement of Equities transactions.

name: FleetCard
definition: Card Settlement-Settlement of Fleet transactions.

name: LowValueCredit
definition: Utilities-Settlement of Low value Credit transactions.

name: LowValueDebit
definition: Utilities-Settlement of Low value Debit transactions.

name: MoneyMarket
definition: Securities Lending-ettlement of Money Market PCH.

name: RapidPaymentInstruction
definition: Instant Payments-Settlement of Rapid Payment Instruction (RPI) transactions.

name: GamblingOrWageringPayment
definition: General-Payments towards a purchase or winnings received from gambling, betting or other wagering activities.

name: LotteryPayment
definition: General-Payment towards a purchase or winnings received from lottery activities.

name: Amex
definition: Card Settlement-Settlement of AMEX transactions.

name: ATM
definition: Card Settlement-Settlement of ATM transactions.

name: AuthenticatedCollections
definition: Utilities-Settlement of Authenticated Collections transactions.

name: PropertyCompletionPayment
definition: Final payment to complete the purchase of a property.

name: PropertyDeposit
definition: Payment of the deposit required towards purchase of a property.

name: PropertyLoanDisbursement
definition: Payment of funds from a lender as part of the issuance of a property loan.

name: PropertyLoanRefinancing
definition: Transfer or extension of a property financing arrangement to a new deal or loan provider, without change of ownership of property.

name: GovernmentFamilyAllowance
definition: Salary and Benefits-Allowance from government to support family.

name: GovernmentHousingAllowance
definition: Salary and Benefits-Allowance from government to individuals to support payments of housing.

name: CashPenalties
definition: Cash penalties related to securities transaction, including CSDR Settlement Discipline Regime.

name: DependentSupportPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment concerning dependent support, for example child support or support for a person substantially financially dependent on the support provider.

name: RetailPayment
definition: Retail payment including e-commerce and online shopping.

name: ChargesBorneByDebtor
definition: Purpose of payment is the settlement of charges payable by the debtor in relation to an underlying customer credit transfer.

name: RegisteredMandate
definition: Utilities-Settlement of Unauthenticated Collections transactions.

name: BonusPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of a bonus.

name: CashManagementTransfer
definition: Transaction is a general cash management instruction.

name: CardBulkClearing
definition: A service that is settling money for a bulk of card transactions, while referring to a specific transaction file or other information like terminal ID, card acceptor ID or other transaction details.

name: CreditCardPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of credit card.

name: TradeSettlementPayment
definition: Transaction is related to settlement of a trade, eg a foreign exchange deal or a securities transaction.

name: DebitCardPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment of debit card.

name: Dividend
definition: Transaction is the payment of dividends.

name: DeliverAgainstPayment
definition: Code used to pre-advise the account servicer of a forthcoming deliver against payment instruction.

name: Epayment
definition: Transaction is related to ePayment.

name: FeeCollectionAndInterest
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of a fee and interest.

name: FeeCollection
definition: A service that is settling card transaction related fees between two parties.

name: PersontoPersonPayment
definition: General Person-to-Person Payment. Debtor and Creditor are natural persons.

name: GovernmentPayment
definition: Transaction is a payment to or from a government department.

name: Hedging
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of a hedging operation.

name: IrrevocableCreditCardPayment
definition: Transaction is reimbursement of credit card payment.

name: IrrevocableDebitCardPayment
definition: Transaction is reimbursement of debit card payment.

name: IntraCompanyPayment
definition: Transaction is an intra-company payment, ie, a payment between two companies belonging to the same group.

name: Interest
definition: Transaction is the payment of interest.

name: LockboxTransactions
definition: Transaction is related to identify cash handling via Night Safe or Lockbox by bank or vendor on behalf of a physical store.

name: Loan
definition: Transaction is related to the transfer of a loan to a borrower.

name: Commercial
definition: Mobile P2B Payment

name: Consumer
definition: Mobile P2P Payment

name: OtherPayment
definition: Other payment purpose.

name: PensionPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of pension.

name: Represented
definition: Collection used to re-present previously reversed or returned direct debit transactions.

name: ReimbursementReceivedCreditTransfer
definition: Transaction is related to a reimbursement for commercial reasons of a correctly received credit transfer.

name: ReceiveAgainstPayment
definition: Code used to pre-advise the account servicer of a forthcoming receive against payment instruction.

name: SalaryPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of salaries.

name: Securities
definition: Transaction is the payment of securities.

name: SocialSecurityBenefit
definition: Transaction is a social security benefit, ie payment made by a government to support individuals.

name: SupplierPayment
definition: Transaction is related to a payment to a supplier.

name: TaxPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of taxes.

name: Trade
definition: Transaction is related to the payment of a trade finance transaction.

name: TreasuryPayment
definition: Transaction is related to treasury operations.  E.g. financial contract settlement.

name: ValueAddedTaxPayment
definition: Transaction is the payment of value added tax.

name: WithHolding
definition: Transaction is the payment of withholding tax.

name: CashManagementSweepAccount
definition:
Classification: Cash Management. Transaction relates to a cash management instruction, requesting a sweep of the account of the Debtor above an agreed floor amount, up to a target or zero balance._x000D_
The purpose is to move the funds from multiple accounts to a single bank account. Funds can move domestically or across border and more than one bank can be used.

name: CashManagementTopAccount
definition:
Classification: Cash Management. Transaction relates to a cash management instruction, requesting to top the account of the Creditor above a certain floor amount, up to a target or zero balance. _x000D_
The floor amount, if not pre-agreed by the parties involved, may be specified.

name: CashManagementZeroBalanceAccount
definition:
Transaction relates to a cash management instruction, requesting to zero balance the account of the Debtor._x000D_
Zero Balance Accounts empty or fill the balances in accounts at the same bank, in the same country into or out of a main account each day.

name: CrossborderMIPayments
definition: Transaction to be processed as a domestic payment instruction originated from a foreign bank.

name: ForeignCurrencyDomesticTransfer
definition: Foreign Currency Transaction that is processed between two domestic financial institutions.

name: CashInPreCredit
definition: Transaction is a direct debit for a cash order of notes and/or coins.

name: CashOutNotesCoins
definition: Transaction is a direct debit for a cash order of notes and/or coins.

name: CarrierGuardedWholesaleValuables
definition: Transaction is a payment towards a Party for the collection of cash by the Cash in Transit company.

name: Savings
definition: Transfer to / from savings or to retirement account.

name: DoddFrank1073Payment
definition: Cross border transaction initiated by US natural person that is subject to compliance with Dodd Frank 1073.
